title: Centaur warrior
data:

*For a list of all centaurs, see [list of centaurs](/List_of_centaurs "List of centaurs").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A muscular centaur, veteran of numerous battles, armed with well-made weapons and able to use them skillfully.***“When Peleus, some distance away, saw him torn apart by the frightful wound he shouted: ‘Accept this tribute to the dead, at least, Crantor, dearest of youths’, and with his powerful arm, he hurled his ash spear, at full strength, at Demoleon. It ruptured the ribcage, and stuck quivering in the bone. The centaur pulled out the shaft minus its head (he tried with difficulty to reach that also) but the head was caught in his lung. The pain itself strengthened his will: wounded, he reared up at his enemy and beat the hero down with his hooves. Peleus received the resounding blows on helmet and shield, and defending his upper arms, and controlling the weapon he held out, with one blow through the arm he pierced the bi-formed breast.” -Ovid, \_Metamorphoses\_, XII, 330. 8 AD. |

## Useful Info

**Centaur warriors** fight using the same tactics as standard [centaurs](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)"), but are an order of magnitude more dangerous. They have enough HP to take a few hits, and can easily deal over 30 damage per shot. They can be found in the mid-late [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon") (usually accompanied by lesser centaurs) and [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") (in large packs of warriors).

As an enemy with the [archer flag](/Category:Archer_flag "Category:Archer flag"), centaurs warriors deal up to 13 extra damage with ranged weapons.

## Tips & Tricks

- They're gruesome at range, so lure them into melee to remove their biggest advantage. Take advantage of corners, [confuse](/Confuse "Confuse") them, or use other tricks to make this less suicidal.
- [Repulsion](/Repulsion "Repulsion") can be a lifesaver for fragile characters here, if you have it.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), centaur warriors did not have a kick attack in melee.

* Unlike regular centaurs, their ranged damage wasn't reduced between versions. So due to the removal of monster weapon penalties in 0.27, centaur warriors became more dangerous.
html:
Centaur warrior

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all centaurs, see list of centaurs.

centaur warrior c 
HP 36-74
HD 10
XP 920
Speed 15
AC 4
EV 8
Will 40
Attack1 16 (hit: plain)
Attack2 5 (kick: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type centaur, centaur
Flags Fighter
Archer
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A muscular centaur, veteran of numerous battles, armed with well-made weapons and able to use them skillfully.

“When Peleus, some distance away, saw him torn apart by the frightful wound he shouted: ‘Accept this tribute to the dead, at least, Crantor, dearest of youths’, and with his powerful arm, he hurled his ash spear, at full strength, at Demoleon. It ruptured the ribcage, and stuck quivering in the bone. The centaur pulled out the shaft minus its head (he tried with difficulty to reach that also) but the head was caught in his lung. The pain itself strengthened his will: wounded, he reared up at his enemy and beat the hero down with his hooves. Peleus received the resounding blows on helmet and shield, and defending his upper arms, and controlling the weapon he held out, with one blow through the arm he pierced the bi-formed breast.”
-Ovid, _Metamorphoses_, XII, 330. 8 AD.

Useful Info

Centaur warriors fight using the same tactics as standard centaurs, but are an order of magnitude more dangerous. They have enough HP to take a few hits, and can easily deal over 30 damage per shot. They can be found in the mid-late Dungeon (usually accompanied by lesser centaurs) and the Vaults (in large packs of warriors).

As an enemy with the archer flag, centaurs warriors deal up to 13 extra damage with ranged weapons.

Tips & Tricks

  • They're gruesome at range, so lure them into melee to remove their biggest advantage. Take advantage of corners, confuse them, or use other tricks to make this less suicidal.
  • Repulsion can be a lifesaver for fragile characters here, if you have it.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, centaur warriors did not have a kick attack in melee.
Unlike regular centaurs, their ranged damage wasn't reduced between versions. So due to the removal of monster weapon penalties in 0.27, centaur warriors became more dangerous.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Centaur_warrior&oldid=80183"

{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Centaur warriors''' fight using the same tactics as standard [[centaur (monster)|centaurs]], but are an order of magnitude more dangerous. They have enough HP to take a few hits, and can easily deal over 30 damage per shot. They can be found in the mid-late [[Dungeon]] (usually accompanied by lesser centaurs) and [[the Vaults]] (in large packs of warriors).

As an enemy with the [[:Category:Archer flag|archer flag]], centaurs warriors deal up to 13 extra damage with ranged weapons.

==Tips & Tricks==
*They're gruesome at range, so lure them into melee to remove their biggest advantage. Take advantage of corners, [[confuse]] them, or use other tricks to make this less suicidal.
*[[Repulsion]] can be a lifesaver for fragile characters here, if you have it.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], centaur warriors did not have a kick attack in melee. 
:Unlike regular centaurs, their ranged damage wasn't reduced between versions. So due to the removal of monster weapon penalties in 0.27, centaur warriors became more dangerous.
